"Camera-assisted meditation": Use a camera to capture and track your movements during meditation, providing you with visual feedback and helping you stay present and focused.
"Camera-enhanced communication": Use a camera to facilitate communication with others, especially when in-person interactions are not possible, such as in remote work or online learning.

"Camera-assisted language learning": Use a camera to help learners practice their language skills by recording themselves speaking and receiving feedback on their pronunciation, intonation, and body language.
"Camera-powered security": Use a camera to monitor and analyze security footage, providing real-time alerts and notifications when suspicious activity is detected.
"Camera-enhanced fitness tracking": Use a camera to track and monitor your fitness routine, providing you with detailed information on your form, technique, and progress.
